org.phantomapi.clust

Class ConfigurationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.phantomapi.clust.ConfigurationHandler

  • public class ConfigurationHandler
extends Object
    The heart of dataclusters. Most should not have to use this. It is essentially a utility class for controllers and any other components of Phantom to use automatically when you need it called. For example, loadCluster would call parts of this when needed.
    Author:
    cyberpwn
